IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE ACLU FOUNDATION OF OREGON IS DEDICATED TO PRESERVING AND DEFENDING CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE ACLU FOUNDATION OF OREGON IS DEDICATED TO PRESERVING AND DEFENDING CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS.
IRS990.Desc: LITIGATION AND COUNSELING CONCERNING ISSUES OF INDIVIDUAL RIGHTS UNDER THE OREGON AND UNITED STATES CONSTITUTIONS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: LEGISLATION: EXAMINATION AND ADVOCACY OF LAWS PROPOSED IN CONGRESS, STATE LEGISLATURE AND LOCAL GOVERNING BODIES AS TO THEIR EFFECT ON CIVIL LIBERTIES AND CIVIL RIGHTS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: EDUCATION: GENERAL EDUCATION PROGRAMS FOR GROUPS OF PEOPLE IN OREGON TO EXPLAIN STATE LAWS, FEDERAL LAWS AND CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TO ESTABLISH AND BUILD AN ENDURING ENDOWMENT TO CARRY OUT THE WORK, OF THE ACLU FOUNDATION AND THE AFFILIATED FOUNDATIONS, OF PROTECTING, PRESERVING AND EXPANDING THE CIVIL LIBERTIES OF ALL PERSONS THROUGHOUT THE UNITED STATES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 4: Description of Significant Changes to Organizational Documents
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD SIZE: REDUCED THE NUMBER OF BOARD MEMBERS TO BE NO FEWER THAN 15 AND NO GREATER THAN 24 MEMBERS (PREVIOUSLY THE RANGE HAD BEEN NO FEWER THAN 20 AND NO GREATER THAN 30).QUORUM: INCREASED THE QUORUM OF THE BOARD TO BE ONE-HALF OF THE DIRECTORS; A QUORUM WAS PREVIOUSLY ONE-THIRD.OFFICERS: THE NAMES AND DUTIES OF SOME OFFICERS CHANGED. THE CORPORATION NOW HAS THE FOLLOWING OFFICERS:PRESIDENTVICE PRESIDENT/SECRETARYVICE PRESIDENT FOR LEGALVICE PRESIDENT FOR NOMINATIONSVICE PRESIDENT FOR EQUITY & INCLUSIONTREASURERMEMBER-AT-LARGE

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 11b: Form 990 Review Process
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: A DRAFT OF THE FORM 990 WAS REVIEWED BY EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND PROVIDED TO THE BOARD PRIOR TO SUBMISSION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 12c: Explanation of Monitoring and Enforcement of Conflicts
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD REVIEWS POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST ISSUES ON AN ONGOING BASIS. CONFLICT OF INTEREST CERTIFICATION FROM BOARD AND COMMITTEE MEMBERS OBTAINED ANNUALLY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15a: Compensation Review & Approval Process - CEO, Top Management
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE REVIEWS THE EXECUTIVE DIRECTORS SALARY ANNUALLY WHEN PREPARING PERFORMANCE EVALUATION. ANY CHANGES TO SALARY ARE RECOMMENDED TO THE BOARD.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 15b: Compensation Review and Approval Process for Officers and Key Employees
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR SETS THE SALARY FOR ASSOCIATE DIRECTOR AND REPORTS THAT INFORMATION TO THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 18: Explanation of Other Means Forms Available For Public Inspection
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REASONABLE REQUESTS FOR ORGANIZATIONAL FORMS 990 ARE FURNISHED UPON REQUEST AT THE OFFICES OF ACLU FOUNDATION OF OREGON, INC.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Line 19: Other Organization Documents Publicly Available
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REASONABLE REQUESTS FOR FINANCIAL STATEMENTS AND GOVERNING DOCUMENTS ARE FURNISHED UPON REQUEST AT THE OFFICES OF ACLU FOUNDATION OF OREGON, INC.
